articles.title: ILLIT, TXT, BOYNEXTDOOR, SEVENTEEN, LE SSERAFIM, NewJeans, And More Rank High On Billboard's World Albums Chart - soompi
articles.description:
Billboard has published its World Albums chart for the week ending on May 11!

ILLIT’s debut mini album “SUPER REAL ME” rose to a new peak of No. 2 following its physical release in the United States, and it also entered the Billboard 200 for the first time…
